fix_templates.title: Add JSON-LD Structured Data
fix_templates.description: Add JSON-LD structured data blocks to the page

steps.title: Identify Schema Types
steps.description: Determine which schema types are appropriate for this page (Organization, WebPage, Article, etc.)

steps.title: Create JSON-LD Block
steps.description: Create a JSON-LD script tag with the appropriate schema markup

steps.title: Add to Page
steps.description: Insert the JSON-LD block in the <head> section of the page

steps.title: Validate
steps.description: Use Google's Rich Results Test to validate the structured data

fix_templates.title: Fix Invalid JSON-LD
fix_templates.description: Fix JSON syntax errors in existing JSON-LD blocks

steps.title: Identify Invalid Blocks
steps.description: Use browser console or validation tools to identify which JSON-LD blocks have errors

steps.title: Fix JSON Syntax
steps.description: Correct JSON syntax errors (missing commas, quotes, brackets, etc.)

steps.title: Validate Structure
steps.description: Ensure the JSON structure matches the expected schema format

steps.title: Test
steps.description: Validate the fixed JSON-LD using Google's Rich Results Test

fix_templates.title: Fix Heading Structure
fix_templates.description: Correct heading hierarchy and ensure single H1

steps.title: Identify All Headings
steps.description: List all H1, H2, and H3 headings on the page

steps.title: Ensure Single H1
steps.description: Keep only the main page title as H1, convert other H1s to H2

steps.title: Fix Hierarchy
steps.description: Ensure headings follow proper hierarchy: H1 > H2 > H3 (no skipping levels)

steps.title: Review Structure
steps.description: Review the heading structure to ensure logical organization

Main Page Title

Section Title

fix_templates.title: Add or Optimize Meta Tags
fix_templates.description: Add missing meta tags or optimize existing ones

steps.title: Add Title Tag
steps.description: Ensure page has a unique, descriptive title tag (50-60 characters)

steps.title: Add Meta Description
steps.description: Add a compelling meta description (150-160 characters) that summarizes the page

steps.title: Optimize Length
steps.description: Ensure title and meta description are within optimal length ranges

steps.title: Make Unique
steps.description: Ensure each page has unique title and meta description

code_example.code:
<head>
  <title>Optimized Page Title (50-60 chars)</title>
  <meta name="description" content="Compelling meta description that summarizes the page content in 150-160 characters.">
</head>

fix_templates.title: Add Canonical URL
fix_templates.description: Add canonical URL to prevent duplicate content issues

steps.title: Determine Canonical URL
steps.description: Identify the preferred (canonical) version of the page URL

steps.title: Add Canonical Tag
steps.description: Add <link rel="canonical"> tag to the <head> section

steps.title: Use Absolute URL
steps.description: Ensure canonical URL is absolute (includes protocol and domain)

steps.title: Verify
steps.description: Verify canonical tag is present and points to correct URL

fix_templates.title: Add FAQ Section
fix_templates.description: Add FAQ section with structured data for answer surfaces

steps.title: Identify Common Questions
steps.description: List common questions users have about the page topic

steps.title: Create FAQ Content
steps.description: Write clear, concise answers to the questions

steps.title: Add FAQ Schema
steps.description: Add FAQPage or Question schema markup

steps.title: Validate
steps.description: Validate FAQ schema using Google's Rich Results Test

code_example.code:
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "FAQPage",
  "mainEntity": [{
    "@type": "Question",
    "name": "What is this?",
    "acceptedAnswer": {
      "@type": "Answer",
      "text": "This is the answer."
    }
  }]
}
</script>

fix_templates.title: Improve Content Quality
fix_templates.description: Enhance content for better AI readability

steps.title: Increase Word Count
steps.description: Add more substantive content to reach minimum word count (300+ words)

steps.title: Organize into Sections
steps.description: Break content into logical sections with clear headings

steps.title: Use Clear Language
steps.description: Simplify language and use direct, clear sentences

steps.title: Add Definitions
steps.description: Define technical terms and acronyms on first use

# Clear Section Title
